text: Christmas Queens 3 is a holiday compilation album, released in 2017. The album is the third installation in a similarly-named series, following Christmas Queens and Christmas Queens 2, and features Alaska Thunderfuck, Bob the Drag Queen, Peppermint, Phi Phi O'Hara, and Sharon Needles, among others. ==Track listing== Track listing adapted from the iTunes Store. ==References== Category:2017 compilation albums Category:2017 Christmas albums Category:Christmas compilation albums Category:Pop Christmas albums Category:RuPaul's Drag Race Category:Producer Entertainment Group albums
title: Christmas Queens 3
